answers.answer: Hi there.I'm sorry to hear that you are in this much pain.  From the way you have described what you are experiencing, it seems that this could be part and parcel of your neuropathy from the diabetes.  Other causes includes muscle strain in the muscles of the neck, or a condition called fibromyalgia (multiple unexplained tender and painful areas in the body).  Make sure that your sugars are well controlled and you can also discuss with your doctor regarding medications for neuropathic pain such as gabapentin or lyrica. I hope you can be rid of this pain soon.  Regards and God bless.
